greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (2^n/n!)*Product_{k=0..n-1} (4*k - 1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: a(n) = -1/n*(if n=1 then (2)^n else Sum_{k=1..n-1} 2^n*binomial(k+n-1, n-1) * (Sum_{j=0..k} (binomial(k,j)*binomial(j,n-1-3*k+2*j)*(3/2)^(3*k-n+1-j)*(-1)^(n-1-3*k)*(1/4)^(k-j) ) ), n>0. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 14 2010
D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) +2*(-4*n+5)*a(n-1)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 16 2020
program: (Maxima) a(n):=-1/n*(if n=1 then (2)^n else sum(sum(binomial(k,j)* binomial(j,n-1-3*k+2*j)*(3/2)^(3*k-n+1-j)*(-1)^(n-1-3*k)*(1/4)^(k-j),j,0,k)*binomial(k+n-1,n-1)*(2)^n,k,1,n-1)); (for ) /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Sep 14 2010 */
(MAGMA) [1] cat [2^n*(&*[4*k-1: k in [0..n-1]])/Factorial(n): n in [1..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 22 2019
(Sage) [8^n*rising_factorial(-1/4, n)/factorial(n) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 22 2019
results.author: Joe Keane (jgk(AT)jgk.org)
